# The `PackedVector` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Store a vector of values using a specific number of bits for each value. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T, unsigned BitNum, typename BitVectorTy = BitVector&gt;
class llvm::PackedVector&lt;T, BitNum, BitVectorTy&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Store a vector of values using a specific number of bits for each value.

Both signed and unsigned types can be used, e.g 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a3849acfead17a2212a7142f1811af9f2">PackedVector&lt;signed, 2&gt;</a> vec;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing> will create a vector accepting values -2, -1, 0, 1. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> other value will hit an assertion.

Definition at line 76 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/packedvector-h">PackedVector.h</a>.
